title: Asia Album: Come explore Myanmar Ethnics Culture Festival
content:
People attend the opening ceremony of Myanmar Ethnics Culture Festival in Yangon, Myanmar, Feb. 1, 2020. (Xinhua/U Aung)
YANGON, Feb. 2 (Xinhua) -- Come explore the diversity of culture and tradition of different ethnic groups in Myanmar.
The Myanmar Ethnics Culture Festival, which kicked off in Yangon on Saturday, will last until Feb. 7 with the participation of varieties of ethnic groups from across Myanmar.
Myanmar State Counsellor Aung San Suu Kyi attends the opening ceremony of Myanmar Ethnics Culture Festival in Yangon, Myanmar, Feb. 1, 2020. (Xinhua/U Aung)
People attend the opening ceremony of Myanmar Ethnics Culture Festival in Yangon, Myanmar, Feb. 1, 2020. (Xinhua/U Aung)
A man attends the opening ceremony of Myanmar Ethnics Culture Festival in Yangon, Myanmar, Feb. 1, 2020. (Xinhua/U Aung)
People attend the opening ceremony of Myanmar Ethnics Culture Festival in Yangon, Myanmar, Feb. 1, 2020. (Xinhua/U Aung)
